title: Kingpin Twitch Good Skin?
body: Just got it in a Mystery Gift? Tried it out in a custom game and found it ok, what do you guys think of it?

replies.body:
Its a Legacy skin if im not mistaken so you are lucky to get it, untill this new Pickpocket skin came out it was my favored twitch skin although gangster twitch is good also, and unlike his other skins the colours do work well together, dispite the splash art looking outdated, But you should consider yourself lucky because with vandal twitch being retired from the store now and im not sure if the Pickpoket skin is limited edition too, but if it too is becoming unavaliable then it means that out of his 6 skins there is only 1 left avaliable in the shop and thats gangster twitch, so at least you have some variety unlike anyone who wants to play him from now on who will have only 1 skin to choose from.
so i would give it (factoring in its limited availability) a 5 or 6/10

Source: Up untill this weekend when Pickpoket come out i used this skin,

I hope you enjoy :)
